Text: The FBI is nothing more than a glorified Gestapo for whichever corrupt Party is in power. We therefore must #AbolishTheFBI, for they are an(other) unconstitutional 3-Letter Agency that has infringed on Americans' Freedoms and Liberties for far too long.

Big thanks to @TvFreeBaltimore for the chat +studio time! Great conversation, and I look forward to the next opportunity. #AndresForCongress #LookMaImOnTV

Easy way to clean out Congress? Kick out every D & R that voted for the horrific #InflationReductionAct. There's no defending it. More taxes, more spending. Same Devil. 

We must elect reps that will fight to repeal -- and that's exactly what I'll do!
#AndresForCongress

If the #InflationReductionAct spends a single dime, then it'll do NOTHING to reduce inflation! We must dramatically reduce federal spending to truly stop inflation. Wasting BILLION$ on more govt bloat got us here in the first place.
#UnplugThePrinters
#Andres4Congress

Idk who needs to hear this, but the Biden Admin would be happy with gas at $15/gal. They WANT high prices. Whatever it takes for us peasants to buy EVs. "Go Green" over everything.

We must significantly reduce the federal govt's power before it's too late!
#VoteLibertarian

I welcome the return of abortion rights to each State and its People to legislate for themselves. Dems used #RoeVWade as a crutch for decades, and are paying for it now. CA and OK will NEVER agree on abortion, so don't force them! Less power to the Feds.
#AndresForCongress

The House voted to send $40B *more* to Ukraine, with major support from D and R. Proof that voting for the corrupt duopoly gets the same results: rampant spending. I'm the most fiscally conservative and non-interventionist candidate running in #MD08. I will keep OUR $$ in the US!

When @RepRaskin isn't fast-tracking billions of $$ sent overseas, he's hellbound on persecuting those who dared entering the Capitol on J6. He does nada to combat gas prices, inflation, or crime. The REAL hard work. I will focus on the wellbeing of #MD08!

#AndresForCongress

I *know* who needs to hear this: America is a Constitutional Republic, NOT a Democracy. If it were a pure Democracy, then majority (ie Mob Rule) would decide every issue. All this talk of "Saving Democracy" is misguided, and a cover for ulterior motives.
Unfortunately, I don't think this is an #AprilFools prank by @RepRaskin.

Congress spends $1 Trillion in the blink of an eye. For perspective, that's equal to 1,000 US companies posting $1 Billion in profit. So no, we don't have a #CorporateGreed problem, it's a government spending problem!
#AndresForCongress
#StopSpendingTrillions

Those with severe obsessions (e.g. Race), often project their values onto others, because we all *obviously* think alike. As a Libertarian, I make no such assumptions.  I control my life, you control yours. I promise to leave you alone...so should the govt!

IDK who needs to hear this, but #ClimateChange IS NOT an "existential threat". Two years of rampant govt spend causes far worse societal damage than 500 years of climate change. Debt is a drastically more immediate threat than rising sea levels.

#Capitalism gets a bad wrap bc of corrupt politicians. They exploit the human tendency for envy to distract from their terribly wasteful spending. All while leveraging insider info to rake in $$$. That ain't free market competition, that's #CORRUPTION.

1. Cuts energy costs by dropping the middleman
2. Less dep on foreign oil = less foreign influence
3. Less foreign influence = less chance of US military action
